page.title: 18THE MARKET, BROMSGROVE
page.content: The market area is a very old part of Bromsgrove and plans are being made for its future. One of the plans to modernise it was to have an under- ground car park below a shopping centre all under one roof. Then when it was revealed in the papers, critics said that it was ugly. The council was trying to get a large retail firm to take an interest in developing the site, but local opinion favours retaining the market in its traditional form. There were a lot of protests so it seems the plans have been dropped for the time being. I think the market should take up the whole car park area as well. In the basement should be a car park, with a market with stalls as they are now, and finally there should be a cinema, supermarkets and other shops above the market.
